content:
# Blockchain by the people, for the people: unleashing impactful use cases

![](https://ucarecdn.com/525aaddb-0680-430e-9e83-696922568ba4/)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27600%27%20height=%27338%27/%3e)
![Blockchain by the people, for the people: unleashing impactful use cases](/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fucarecdn.com%2F30a2aaad-8e20-4549-b754-9e94e619ca6a%2F&w=1200&q=75)

Tomorrow we will have a look at how Gimbalabs' [Andamio](https://www.andamio.io/) project is working closely with top builders in the ecosystem like [MeshJS](https://meshjs.dev/) and [SIDAN lab](https://sidan.io/) to make Cardano a world-class blockchain. Link to the event: <https://cardanospot.io/sidan-lab-livestream>

![](https://cspot-be.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/1706581489457_image_1706580243271.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA3LBTR2WEKATHV42E%2F20240130%2Feu-north-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20240130T023446Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-Signature=ce244138adc2c237723a341bd60cb73b3cbe0429005eb67a113e7cefee8f6105&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

![](https://cspot-be.s3.eu-north-1.amazonaws.com/1706581489457_image_1706580243271.jpg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=AKIA3LBTR2WEKATHV42E%2F20240130%2Feu-north-1%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20240130T023446Z&X-Amz-Expires=604800&X-Amz-Signature=ce244138adc2c237723a341bd60cb73b3cbe0429005eb67a113e7cefee8f6105&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

SIDAN Lab: <https://cardano.ideascale.com/c/idea/114529>

Andamio: <https://cardano.ideascale.com/c/idea/113455>

Also, see here the F11 proposals of some of our partners: <https://linktr.ee/andamio>

----

Best + see you soon!
